title: Toyota Unveils All-new 2026 RAV4: 100% Electrified, Three Bold Designs, and Family-Friendly Innovation!
content:
100% Electrified: Hybrid & Plug-in Hybrid Powertrains for Every Lifestyle

Say goodbye to gas-guzzling—every 2026 RAV4 comes with the efficiency of Hybrid Electric (HEV) or Plug-in Hybrid (PHEV) power:
  • HEV Models:
    • 5th-generation hybrid system boosts power to 236 hp (AWD) or 226 hp (FWD)—first-ever FWD hybrid option for smoother, more efficient city drives.
    • Perfect for families seeking reliable mileage without compromising performance.
  • PHEV Models:
    • Unleash 320 hp and a 20% longer all-electric range (50 miles estimated)—ideal for eco-conscious adventurers.
    • XSE and Woodland trims offer DC fast charging (10-80% in 30 minutes*), so you spend less time plugged in and more time on the road.
  • Towing Power: AWD trims (HEV/PHEV) tow up to 3,500 lbs—haul bikes, campers, or gear with ease.

Three Distinct Designs: Core, Rugged, or Sport—Your RAV4, Your Style

Choose a look that matches your family’s vibe:
  • Core Design: Sleek and modern, with a paint-matched grille and bold hammerhead front end. Perfect for daily sophistication, available in LE, XLE, and Limited trims with 17–20-inch wheels.
  • Rugged Woodland: Built for adventure! Features a raised hammerhead grille with LED lights, all-terrain tires, a half-inch taller ride height, and roof rails for kayaks or bikes. Standard AWD (HEV/PHEV)—ready for dirt roads or mountain getaways.
  • Sport GR SPORT (First-Ever!): Co-developed with Toyota GAZOO Racing, this adrenaline-pumping trim features a GR-tuned suspension, 20-inch summer tires, and aggressive spoilers. Exclusive to PHEV, it’s all about thrilling handling and head-turning style.

Family-Friendly Interior: Comfort, Tech, and Smart Space

Inside, the RAV4 prioritizes functionality and fun:
  • Smart Layout: A central touchscreen (10.5-inch standard, 12.9-inch available) integrates digital HVAC controls, while the shift-by-wire system frees up console space for phones, snacks, or tablets.
  • Premium Touches: Choose from fabric, SofTex® leatherette, or BRIN•NAUB® microsuede seats. Woodland trims add earthy Mineral-colored interiors and all-weather floor mats—perfect for messy kids or muddy pets.
  • Tech for Everyone:
    • Standard 12.3-inch digital gauge cluster with customizable displays.
    • Wireless Apple CarPlay®/Android Auto™, dual Bluetooth® connectivity, and JBL® premium audio (9-speaker system) for road-trip singalongs.
    • Head-Up Display (HUD) on Limited (HEV) and XSE (PHEV) keeps your eyes on the road.

Arene Platform: The Future of Safety and Connectivity

Powered by Toyota’s Arene software platform (first in a Toyota vehicle!), the RAV4 introduces:
  • Toyota Safety Sense 4.0 (TSS 4.0): Advanced driver-assist features like improved lane tracking, automatic emergency braking, and adaptive cruise control—standard on all trims—to keep your family protected.
  • Next-Gen Audio Multimedia: Intuitive controls, real-time traffic updates on the digital gauge cluster, and a responsive voice assistant (“Hey Toyota, find the nearest park!”).

Ready for Adventure—Price and Availability

The 2026 RAV4 arrives at U.S. dealerships later this year. Pricing announced soon—but here’s what you get standard:
  • ToyotaCare: 2 years/25,000 miles of free maintenance and 24/7 roadside assistance (because family trips shouldn’t stress you out).
  • Warranty: 10-year/150,000-mile hybrid battery coverage (transferable!), 8-year/100,000-mile hybrid component warranty, and 3-year/36,000-mile basic coverage.

Why Wait? Your Dream SUV Just Got Better.

Whether you’re a city dweller, outdoor explorer, or sporty parent, the 2026 RAV4 offers something for every family. With 100% electrified powertrains, rugged versatility, and tech that grows with you, it’s not just a car—it’s your partner in making memories.
Stay tuned for pricing—and get ready to drive the future of family SUVs.
Visit Toyota.com/RAV4 to learn more and sign up for updates!
*Disclaimer: *Estimated range based on manufacturer testing. Actual range may vary. Always follow charging guidelines.
section: Plano, TX — May 20, 2025 — Toyota just redefined the compact SUV game with the all-new 6th generation RAV4—America’s favorite family ride, now fully electrified, bold in design, and loaded with cutting-edge tech. Whether you’re tackling weekday carpools, weekend adventures, or craving thrilling drives, the 2026 RAV4 delivers choice, power, and style—all in one iconic package.
